page.title: 13CASTLETOWN LEGEND-2
page.content: {LEGEND OF ST.TROTHAN { Andrew Gilbertson}was an unlucky,poor crofter living in{Murkle.} Hens went missing and then his cow went dry. One night he dreamt that a man told him to walk the beach until he found something that would make him rich. This he did until he found a {chest} with a cross on it.When he opened it he found a baby girl whom he kept even though he had twelve girls already. Then Andrew's luck changed.His cow gave the best milk,his crops flourished,his sheep lived and his hens did not go missing.He bought a larger farm at {Olrig}.The girl was named Trothan.By the age of six she had magical powers.She even had second sight.When she died she was buried in{ {Olrig Kirkyard}.On her grave is a hole which is always damp and, if tampered with, disaster will follow.
